description: With the command you can personalize your level card
usage:
{emotes.use} | Use {prefix}levelsettings setbg <number> / reset | setcolor <Hex-/Rgb-Color> reset
{emotes.use} | You can find a list of available background images [here](https://nevar.eu/content/discord/cards?lang={lang})
resetted: {emotes.success} | You have reset your background image for the level card
bgSet: {emotes.success} | You have set your background image for the levelcard to [number {number}]({url})
colorReset: {emotes.success} | You have reset the color of your level card
colorSet: {emotes.success} | You have set the color of your level card to {color}
